options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for CiscoDuoSecurity. You can get CiscoDuoSecurity custom log data in your Azure Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this Solution deploys. This data connector creates custom log table(s) CiscoDuo_CL in your Azure Sentinel / Azure Log Analytics workspace.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Azure Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Azure Sentinel.
